Wacky Alteration Ideas

1
Obsalyn
Sunday, August 13th, 2017, 11:55:39 PM

Thought I'd start a thread about weird ideas. This one is a Wonder Woman themed outfit. She was one of my favorite comic book characters growing up and I thought this up ten years ago, and recently found it when I went through my old computer files. It's based more on her comic book outfit and less on the movie.

A pointed golden tiara inset with a sparkling ruby star A fitted scarlet silk bodice embroidered with a golden eagle crest A ruffled blue silk skirt dusted with white diamond stars A wide golden girdle topped with a stylized eagle head Some wide silver bracelets inlaid with ruby stars Some knee high scarlet boots edged with white striping
